snippet: A group of smaller credit rating agencies outside the United States has formed Arc Ratings, a new company that the group hopes will provide a viable alternative to the so-called Big 3 credit rating agencies when it comes to international debt...
abstract: A group of smaller credit rating agencies outside the United States has formed Arc Ratings, a new company that the group hopes will provide a viable alternative to the so-called Big 3 credit rating agencies when it comes to international debt financing.

headline.main: New Ratings Agency Hopes to Compete With Big 3 Outside U.S.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Credit Ratings and Credit Rating Agencies
